attributes.title: HORRIFYING APP
attributes.review: This app has caused my 6 year old trauma... She was playing on my phone and when she got bored of playing Subway Surfers she saw this app and clicked on it.. Next thing you know she was screaming my name from her room when i was in the living room watching TV. She saw a cheeto monster who is destroying our lives. This is a horrible app and it should be taken down once and for all because there are many more terrible reviews.

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: Trump 2020 app left a huge virus on my phone, laptop and tablet. By having a virus it leaked all my personal data, WiFi, credit card numbers and etc. I have to start all over because I ended having someone steal my identification and went bankrupt for this. I almost lost my job and the deducted my pay from this virus. If you choose to download this app then you can try your luck but I warned you.

attributes.title: cult activity
attributes.review: When I opened the app, I was immediately bombarded with joining the “the trump humping train.” As I read the reviews from members, I realized they had all been brainwashed to worship a fat, orange, antichrist cheeto. The dedication & firm beliefs of the trump humping train is no doubt a cult. This app is used to trick you & initiate you. By asking for your personal information, it collects all of your data to own you. Beware! If tricked into being a trump humper, you will lose all intelligence & respect!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: This app literally broke my brand new iPhone. It gave me a virus that showed Trump's nudes all over the screen, which were disgusting btw, and i couldn't even turn my phone off. When I brought it into the store the workers said it was unfixable, and I had to buy a new iphone. I'm completely outraged and i will NOT be voting for Trump in the next election, if this is any example of how his campaign is going. Would give it 0 stars if i could.

attributes.title: 10/10 WORST family restaurant ever!!! 😡🤬😡😡
attributes.review:
so i’m a father of four children and when i find out that trump had opened a restaurant ONLY for trump supporters, i was ECSTATIC. so like the good bootlicker i am, i drive my family to his new restaurant. and boy will i tell you that this restaurant is horrendous!! the waiters are all orange fat men with small dicks with a horrible spray tan! and when i ordered my whole family rich people, THEY GOT ME CAPITALISM INSTEAD!! i will NEVER come here or recommend ANYONE TO THIS RESTAURANT AGAIN!!

-bernie

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
do NOT download this app 🤯🤯 i downloaded it so i could finally become the best trump supporter that there ever was but when i downloaded it, my screen started changing colors. i was so confused but that’s when i saw it, the cheeto mans saggy balls. o started throwing up profusely and my grandma took me to the ER and when i showed the doctor what happened he got so sick he passed out and slowly turned into a cheeto man as well. this app destroys life’s
smh i don’t recommend 😡😡

attributes.title: I almost died!!
attributes.review: I supported trump till now. I first open the app and my eyes instantly started bleeding. Then my phone glitches and sends me to a ask for help website. And see another picture of this orange hairless man. That’s when my mom walks in and thought I was look at oranges. As she looks at the picture she faint then I faint. I am terrified and have not been able to sleep. Do not support the man that’s to kill people with his orange looks🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠

attributes.title: I can’t believe this is a real app 👎🏼😡
attributes.review: Don’t even get me started on the photos that appear when you first open the app. There is this very ugly cheetoe-colored man on the app when you first click it. I already thought that Cheetos had a mascot is trump really even allowed to copy the mascot. I wish I had shield in my eyes before. Donald Trump is  a racist homophobic rapist white supremacist. He is so weird he rapes little kids why does a rapist have a app TAKE THIS APP DOWN ITS SO SCARY 😡😡😡😰😰😂🎂😆😆🥳🎈🎈😄🥶😃👎🏼
